review: As Google begins to roll out more features for the Chromecast, this spur of the moment buy keeps getting better and better. Although I do wish I did not have to be on my local network to use everything the Chromecast can do, when I'm in the house its easy and quick (takes me about 10 seconds to get connected to it from start to go!) to broadcast something on the TV for the entire family to watch a funny youtube video or flip through a photo album from our phones. If you are on the fence about this device, consider it! My TV has a USB port right next to the HDMI jack, so charging the Chromecast was easy. I can see why it would be difficult if you had to plug this into a wall outlet. But considering there are no re-occuring costs or other apps to buy to make the Chromecast work, this buy will only get better and better as time goes on.
author: Columbus Family Man "Lee"
